text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response clearly explains the connection test under Section 2, stating that counterclaims must 'arise directly out of the subject-matter of the dispute' and must be 'inextricably linked' to the investor\u2019s claim, often requiring them to share the 'same factual matrix' or relate to the 'same investment or contractual relationship.'
